solution_line_template: First find the total cost of the toppings: {num_toppings} toppings * ${cost_per_topping}/topping = $<<{num_toppings}*{cost_per_topping}={total_topping_cost}>>{total_topping_cost}
Then add that amount to the cost of the ice cream: ${total_topping_cost} + ${ice_cream_cost} = $<<{total_topping_cost}+{ice_cream_cost}={total_sundae_cost}>>{total_sundae_cost}
